ai-patthana12.6:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana12.6:2.1_0: (The remainder should not be given up in brief.)
ai-patthana12.6:3.1_4: You shouldn’t give up wrong development.
ai-patthana12.6:4.1_0: You shouldn’t give up wrong development.
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_0: You don’t give rise to thought of thought. ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_1: You don’t give rise to thought. ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_4: nor does she give rise to thought.
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_5: nor does she give rise to thought.
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_6: They don’t give rise to diversity of rapture ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_7: you don’t cultivate the way of giving up rapture ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_8: Neither sees the happiness of pleasurable. ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_10: You don’t recite the teaching with equanimity based on all sides. ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_11: for the sake of neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-patthana12.6:6.1_0: You don’t try because of hope,
ai-patthana12.6:6.1_1: You don’t instruct because of famine.
ai-patthana12.6:6.1_2: Nor do they break into houses ...
ai-patthana12.6:6.1_3: nor does he teach the Dhamma for the sake of a disciple.
ai-patthana12.6:6.1_4: Nor do they listen to the teaching ...
ai-patthana12.6:6.1_5: nor does he teach the Dhamma for the sake of a disciple.
ai-patthana12.6:7.1_0: for the sake of not for the sake of seeing the teaching ...
ai-patthana12.6:7.1_1: not for the sake of debates. ...
ai-patthana12.6:7.1_2: Don’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-patthana12.6:7.1_3: for the sake of a principle free of pain ...
ai-patthana12.6:7.1_4: for the sake of not seeing the teaching ...
ai-patthana12.6:8.1_0: (This) Is there’re not to be expanded as in brief.)
ai-patthana12.6:11.1_0: Nor causes the reason for the sake of conflict is a cause.
ai-patthana12.6:11.1_1: Nor gives rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.6:11.1_2: Nor arise because of cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.6:12.1_0: Nor causes and conditions for the cause.
ai-patthana12.6:12.1_1: Not knowing and seeing the cause or reason for the sake of conjure, the reason for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana12.6:12.1_2: Nor arise because of cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.6:13.1_0: Nor makes a cause or reason for the sake of conflict, nor for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana12.6:13.1_1: Nor makes a cause or reason for the sake of conflict, nor for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana12.6:13.1_2: Nor arise because of cause or reason.
